original_title: 男はつらいよ 寅次郎あじさいの恋
overview: During his travels, Tora-san gets drunk with an old man in Kyoto. Though Tora-san never fully comprehends his importance, the old man is a Living National Treasure ceramist. At his home, Tora-san makes a good impression on the old man's maid, who apparently falls in love with Tora-san.
title: Hearts and Flowers for Tora-san
